#!/bin/bash #check install.log for errors
if grep "scriptlet failed" /root/install.log 1>/dev/null ; then errors=`grep -v "NOKEY" /root/install.log | \ grep -v "*** FINISHED INSTALLING PACKAGES ***" | \ grep -v "^Installing "` echo -e "Errors found in /root/install.log:\n$errors" >&2 exit 1 fi
